title: Kinetic theory - average K and temperature

content.question: Monatomic Gas <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> consists of atoms of mass <math alttext="m sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> and has temperature <math alttext="T sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>. Monatomic Gas <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> consists of atoms of mass <math alttext="m sub B equals 2 m sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> and has temperature <math alttext="T sub A equals 2 times T sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="K sub average A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,A</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub average B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,B</mtext></msub></math>, the average kinetic energy atoms in Gas <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and Gas <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="K sub average A, is less than K sub average B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="K sub average A, equals K sub average B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,B</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="K sub average A, is greater than K sub average B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mtext>avg,B</mtext></msub></math>
